r.d: The Log framework provides an abstracted logging system. It supports logging to console, file, Firebug, syslog, SQL, Sqlite, mail, mcal, and window targets. It also provides composite and subject - observer mechanisms.
r.n: - The Firebug handler's unit test now passes. (Bug 12674) - Fixed a PHP4 compatibility problem involving class_exists(). (Bug 12675)
